Text: thanks MBR i'm droping but taking a while

its two days for the complete 10GB launch
thanks for staying in! Michael
no probs michael still dropping at 60% at the mo but will keep going and leave on per the norm. once again thanks
Im on a constant 117k up from start till completion - thanks for being kind - I can see someone is giving a lot but some are slow to give up what they get too it seems

By the way, we sometimes have a power failure in our area which lasts a few minutes each time. We had one a few minutes ago in fact. We have almost never suffered from down-time from this fact however - as we use a UPS (uninterruptible power supply) on our main server to keep  things going automatically each time. Recommend each "career seeder" invest in one certainly! thanks, Michael
